sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtndammapkno ( knwldg_ty_code , orgnzt_id , expert_id , knwldg_ty_nm , cl_de , knwldg_url , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #knwldgTyCode# , #orgnztId# , #expertId# , #knwldgTyNm# , #clDe# , #knwldgUrl# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtndammapkno SET knwldg_ty_code = #knwldgTyCode# , orgnzt_id = #orgnztId# , expert_id = #expertId# , knwldg_ty_nm = #knwldgTyNm# , cl_de = #clDe# , knwldg_url = #knwldgUrl# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND knwldg_ty_code = #knwldgTyCode#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtndammapkno WHERE 1 = 1 AND knwldg_ty_code = #knwldgTyCode#
sqlMap.select: SELECT knwldg_ty_code , orgnzt_id , expert_id , knwldg_ty_nm , cl_de , knwldg_url , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNDAMMAPKNO WHERE knwldg_ty_code = #knwldgTyCode#

SELECT A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE , A.ORGNZT_ID , A.EXPERT_ID , A.KNWLDG_TY_NM , A.CL_DE , A.KNWLDG_URL , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT KNWLDG_TY_CODE , ORGNZT_ID , EXPERT_ID , KNWLDG_TY_NM , CL_DE , KNWLDG_URL , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNDAMMAPKNO WHERE 1=1
KNWLDG_TY_CODE = #searchKeyword#
ORGNZT_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY KNWLDG_TY_CODE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNDAMMAPKNO WHERE 1=1
KNWLDG_TY_CODE = #searchKeyword#
ORGNZT_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
